textBox.richText: It’s boring to play against yourself or against a friend next to you, I know this. I have plans to implement network gaming in Netwars so that it’s possible to play against friends (Or other people) over the internet. But please give me some time, it’s a big job, and I’m only one person and I have only two hands - I’m not that fast. (If anyone wants to help me, just contact me!)
